lender.name: Ess
lender.loan_because: The world is a better place when we help others in need - especially those who are willing to work hard to improve their own lives. ~ In memory of my beautiful sister.
lender.occupational_info: Zoologist

lender.name: Cherry
lender.loan_because: People can accomplish so much with so little.

lender.name: Teller
lender.occupational_info: I am a Sophomore in highschool

lender.name: hearts for change
lender.loan_because: help for self help, we want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: we work at a real estate company in Lund, southern Sweden

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I believe that a loan is the best helping hand we can give and the best another person can get. I feel very lucky for what I have and enjoy watching others succeed.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone who wants to better their situation, to support themselves and their family, deserves the encouragement and support to help them achieve their goals.

lender.name: ODETTE MBA SOCIETY
lender.loan_because: It is our mission to help empower people form around the world. A loan allows us to give to those in need while it benefits the receiver because it allows them to learn how to earn a living by utilizing the loan.
lender.occupational_info: The MBA Society is the student society for the Odette School of Business in Windsor, Ontario, Canada. We have 40 students in the program and raise money to further enhance our education in the business world through practical experience.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: i like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: i do not have a job because I'm ten years old and i still go to school. my only job is homework.

lender.name: Ray and Liana
lender.loan_because: We believe that we should all have the same opportunities to do well in the world. Helping others by sharing our good fortune lets those in need know that they are not alone. Hopefully that makes the World a better place to live in. Peace and Justice for all.
lender.occupational_info: Ray is a computer engineer. Liana is a nurse

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I care about helping people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am pastor of a suburban church in California.

lender.name: Sue & Steve
lender.loan_because: To give is to receive.

lender.name: Jostein
lender.loan_because: I hope I can take part in a good thing, and try to make the World a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I do different things at a school. I help the childeren whit their homework and things like that.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: I like helping people, and trying to make this a better world
lender.occupational_info: I dont have a job, im nearly 12 years old ^^

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I work at International Justice Mission - a human rights agency that secures justice for victims of forced labor, sexual exploitation and other forms of violent oppression, with field offices in Latin America, Africa, South Asia, and Southeast Asia.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: and thanks to my uncle i found out about kiva i am happy for helping the ones in need.
lender.occupational_info: i am 13 years old i am in 7th grade i still go to school so i dont have a job

lender.name: Raveena
lender.loan_because: small and simple acts of kindness can change someone's life.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I loan because financial services should be available to everyone, not just the well-off. I loan because I believe in the power of entrepreneurship to create change -- within a community, and on a global scale. And I loan because I believe in the ability of people everywhere to create a sustainable livelihood for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Mia
lender.whereabouts: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Las Palmas
lender.loan_because: i love to help and empower people and i adore organizations such as Kiva. The Internet has such a negative image in many ways, but isnt it wonderful that we can use it for something like Kiva?
lender.occupational_info: I write articles and columns for the German print market right now, but id love to get a different kind of job, something that "makes more sense" in an ecological, social or spiritual way.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: i am currently going to school

lender.name: Yohandre
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to use their skills and knowledge to make their own lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse in a university hospital in Miami, Florida.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the efficacy of microloans to empower and motivate people!
lender.occupational_info: I build a bridge between the non-profit and for-profit sectors, by collaborating to find opportunities to engage with each other in mutually beneficial ways.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a lawyer.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: many people don't have the money needed to expand their business. most are trying to improve the quality of their families life. this should be supported

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: When this world gets its head on straight, we reach over borders to embrace, we look eachother right square in the face and say, "This is waste not, want not space".
lender.occupational_info: I help kids with emotional difficulties to be successful in the community, schools, and at home.

lender.name: Tanner
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world, when no one else will.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 17 year old student.

lender.name: Marc
lender.occupational_info: Creator of holographic projection systems in home or office, so as to create an educatiional therapeutic atmosphere.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I am thoroughly committed to this program. This is a hand up...not a hand out ... and it bodes well for a better world. At least I hope so.
lender.occupational_info: Although I am retired I volunteer twice a week at our Free Care Clinic. Our clients are ones without health insurance and of a very low income...but, here in the US they still have much more than many that I sponsor through KIVA.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can. I've led a very privileged life and this is one way to give back and to honor all the strong women in my life.
lender.occupational_info: To get your own femiNinja shirt or bumper sticker, check out the link below. All my proceeds go to the rape crisis center that I volunteer with.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I'm just trying to make the world better.

lender.name: Rich

lender.occupational_info: I work for the US government, managing a national center that makes loans to small businesses.

lender.name: Jackson H.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need assistance getting a start on a better life.

lender.occupational_info: Working with children as a teacher and counselor

lender.occupational_info: Former Nurse caring for sick babies and road construction supervisor.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student studying water resources engineering

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate to make a loan for Christmas! But my sister gave me the gift certificate because she knows I like helping people out if I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an airline. I have specific routes assigned to me. I look at the routes and whether they are making money or not. Then I make recommendations to add or reduce the number of flights on the route.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: We all are interconnected. The many people who work so hard and are overlooked by the established lending institutions deserve a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I image various documents for records retention which allows people to access these from a database/computer for later viewing

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: It is how I can help others at this point of my life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is very passionate about social change.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of women
lender.occupational_info: My job is to maintain a safe and predictable home where family members can grow, rest and love in peace. I also volunteer at the local school teaching children to read.

lender.name: caracal
lender.loan_because: I really want to support those that are working hard to help themselves. It is a small thing to do for such a big reward as to be privileged to be part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I provide support to people wishing to find and attain their life's work.

lender.name: Tara
lender.occupational_info: I work with special education students with Autism.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Just doing my part to pay it forward, a little bit at a time.

lender.occupational_info: My company plans and produces events for business and social events, including weddings. We help people celebrate special moments in their lives! A very rewarding job!

lender.occupational_info:
I take classes in history at the university. Most of my classes have between 10 and 20 students. Someday I hope to be a teacher.

lender.occupational_info: My work allows me to improve our environment, create beauty through gardens both ornamental and edible, and educates.

lender.name: Galen
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school, play baseball, and volunteer at a summer camp for children.

lender.name: Megan & Ian
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our children how to care about others.

lender.name: MATHORNE LLC
lender.loan_because: The Microloans are a very important tool. We help people locally and we help them to be independent and based on their own small business that can provide the family a living. And with microloans the same money can work over and over again and help many different people.
lender.occupational_info: My company venture with Start-up businesses or small and medium size companies who needs to undergo successful business turn-around. Our aim is to create financial healthy businesses that are a dominant player in the markets where they operate.

lender.name: Florence
lender.loan_because: I think poor people should be able to find human dignity and empower themselves through their work and not (only) thanks to pure charity.

lender.name: Paulo de Carvalho

lender.loan_because: To stimulate entrepreneurship.

lender.loan_because: We want to help other people

lender.name: Michael and Kristin
lender.loan_because: We're lucky to live where we live and do what we do......we want to share the Canadian quality of life and comfort with the developing world. This is a good place to start!

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: my aunt Linnea just taught me about Kiva and gave me a gift certificate!
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business trying to help kids do better in school.

lender.loan_because: The world is a beautiful place and everyone should see it that way.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea and I support it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Middle School Social Studies Teacher at an International School in Jakarta.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I'm fascinated by the magnitude of the effect a small boost can have on an individual, community or the world. I believe basic needs and self sufficiency are key in acheiving world peace. I was given a birthday gift of money to loan in the form of a Kiva gift certificate. What an amazing opportunity and a gift that keeps on giving! The gift of being able to help others and expand my own horizons a little is perfect for me and the people who gave it to me knew I would love this!
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer. I design airplanes for my career. For fun I oversee the design of small projects by students and professionals to provide basic needs in developing communities.

lender.name: Charlie & Kathryn
lender.loan_because: We want to help others.

lender.name: Hiro

lender.name: Astonish Me

Life is all about giving back what you can, when you can, how you can.

lender.occupational_info: We help people realise what the internet can do for them

lender.name: Michele
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student right now. When I finish I will work in a school as a guidance counselor for high school students.

lender.name: Toad
lender.loan_because: Just wanna help someone even I don't know about her/him.
lender.occupational_info: User interface design, web site planning & propose, web design & scripting

lender.loan_because: Jesus is my savior and my Lord.

lender.loan_because: We want to help!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I'm extending a gift given to me, forward, to someone who is working for themselves.

lender.loan_because: Just my way to try to build a better world, I guess.

lender.name: Dobyns Family
lender.loan_because: We just want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Run small trucking company.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse with extra training.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: My small donation makes a big difference to someone out there -- some place on the planet I will probably never be able to visit. It's a good feeling -- helping a person make a better life through 'random' teamwork. (We do it together without ever meeting!) What a brilliant concept!

lender.name: Manoj
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to be a struggling entrepreneur, given today's declining real estate market.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Mark and Gigi
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little bit of help to start something new.

lender.name: Selenia
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I file wage complaints.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have traveled in the developing world, enjoyed those travels immensely and want to give back. Kiva offers a very personal, vivid way to do that!
lender.occupational_info: I try to educate university women to be stronger, kinder, more compassionate and more courageous!

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: It is important to enable people to take action towards improving life for themselves and their community.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: If I have extra, someone else can put it to good use.
lender.occupational_info: Service of electrical power equipment.

lender.name: Aymster
lender.loan_because: I admire people with that entrepreneurial spirit and I think that is a quality that needs to be encouraged worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software tester

lender.name: Bob

lender.name: Praxi

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I work to make sure the government is accountable to its people.

lender.name: Hal
lender.loan_because: local, community banks in the US helped out my grandparents' generation a century ago, and banking must return to be a function of the everyday person
lender.occupational_info: i try to make networking technology accessible on all scales, from huge enterprises to a micro scale for students, small businesses or startups. Networking spreads ideas, information and empowers individuals.

lender.name: Laura and Dale
lender.loan_because: We all need help now and then.
lender.occupational_info: There is nothing like working with kids and helping them become the best that they can be.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I care and want to make a difference in the lives of others who need a helping hand to get started.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: There are people who need the money more than I do.

lender.name: BRINDA
lender.loan_because: I have a company in middle east which is affected by the global credit crunch. I employ 43 construction workers. The employees are very understanding and adjusting to the changing market but I am unable to put them through hardship. Currently I am looking to fund their expenses through this service since only people can help people. I am unable to get a loan from the bank since the I already have a loan with them which I took out to start the company.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software consultant and make 6 figure salary in dollars hence any funding provided to me WILL be repayed as per the terms.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I support the redistribution of wealth

lender.name: Clemency
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who need this money more than me (:
lender.occupational_info: Its difficult.

lender.name: Guttorm
lender.loan_because: It 's a really, really great idea! And a good way to spread some funds from where we have to much to where there isn't enough. Money directly to the person who needs it, for a good project. And you get a feeling that it actually works, when the distance between yourself and the person/project is that short, at least here on the web!
lender.occupational_info: I make music. And play it to others. I also have 3 kids, so I guess my main job is being a dad.

lender.name: ANGELINA
lender.occupational_info: We are engineers, scientists, craftsmen, technicians, administrators and friends who want to make a difference where small loans can improve people's lives in big ways.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: Uplift someone's desire/hope to succeed!

lender.name: Carrie-Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I am able to make a good living and I want to share what I can with other people that need it. I always wish I could travel more and get to know more about other cultures and ways of life, so this also helps me to feel more connected to wonderful people and places who otherwise seem so far away.
lender.occupational_info: I do administrative work for a company in downtown San Francisco where we help entrepreneurs grow companies related to health, wellness, and sustainable living.

lender.name: sam
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra money.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupational_info: I help graduate students to become mental health counselors for individuals, couples and families.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: "Give someone a fish and they will eat for a day. Support them so that they fish and they will eat for the rest of their livs" (new version of a Chinese proverb)

lender.loan_because: I have had lots of people help me when I needed it. It has made my heart very humble, and I hope to help others in the same way.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actress in the theater and on television. I like to act in comedies to make people laugh and spread joy.

lender.name: tami
